## contextSelector variable

Selector to extract the request context

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
contextSelector: SyncSelector<Context>
```

## Example

Simple example

```ts

const prismyHandler = prismy(
 [contextSelector],
 context => {
   ...
 }
)

```
